extention_des.message: Sauvegarde les données de lecture localement, qui pourront être affichée sur un overlay Xsplit

opt_des.message: Cliquez sur les icones en dessous de chaques options pour plus d'informations

opt_donate.message: Si vous trouvez cette extension utile, j'apprécirai beaucoup si vous envisagiez de donner à charity:water. cliquez ici pour en savoir plus, ou pour donner, cliquez ici.

opt_9.message: Vérifier si le stream est actif avant de sauvegarder ?

opt_tt_0.message: The directory where the now playing file is saved, may also be used for caching stream status

opt_tt_1.message: The file format that the now playing file is saved as. Xsplit supports both XML and TXT, OBS just supports TXT. XML allows you display different info in different text titles in your scenes

opt_tt_3.message:
For the list of available variables and which sites support them, and examples click here.
OBS users using the "Scroll" option may need to add a few spaces to the end of this option to prevent the first and last word from merging

opt_tt_4.message: The maximum length of 'Now Playing', Artist, Track, Album variables. Must be a number between 10 and 256

opt_tt_5.message: The album artwork will be saved to "SaveDirectory/unp_album_art.jpg". PNG album art is sent to a server operated by the developer, which converts the image to JPG for the extension to download and save. For the list of supported sites, click here

opt_tt_7.message:
Send now playing data to Nightbot, which will allow viewers to recieve now playing information via twitch/justin tv chat. To do this, create a custom command in the Nightbot.tv panel, for more information see the Nightbot wiki

Please note, Nightbot isn't operated by the developer of UNPN, it's a third party service

opt_tt_8.message: Your unique Nightbot API key can be obtained here

opt_tt_9.message: This will check your stream is live before saving any 'Now Playing' data or sending anything to Nightbot. This offers increased privacy, however it requires requests to Justin/Twitch TV, and should only be enabled if you require the extra privacy

opt_tt_10.message: Your Stream details, only used if the 'Check stream' option is enabled

opt_tt_11.message: Le fichier sera vidé à chaque fois qu'une page supportée par UNPN sera fermée

sites_des.message: This is a list of the supported sites, and their available features. This information is only for users who want more customisation, and is irrelevant for the majority of users. The symbols in brackets are the variables used for formatting the "Plain text" save as option.

sites_des_2.message: "Now Playing" (%s%), "Time Started" (%t%) and "URL" (%u%) variables are fully supported by every site. The magnifying glass icon denotes sites which don't display the artist and title information seperately, for these sites UNP will try to split the information into Artist and Title, but accuracy can't be guaranteed.

sites_note.message: *: Soundcloud has 5 different page layouts. For best results use the detailed artist, track or set view, and don't navigate away; otherwise UNPN may only be able to pick up Artist, Track and URL.

sites_note_2.message: *: Xiami radio is not supported because of the useage flash player. Please use xiami player page.

sites_example_1.message: If you listen to GrooveShark, and your plain text format is set to:

sites_des_3.message: Support for more sites will be added over time. If you have a suggestion for a site, please contact me.

about_des.message: "Untamed Now Playing Next" is a Chrome extension which parses the song title and artist from popular online radio/music sites, and writes it to a file on your hard drive. Programs such as Xsplit or OBS can then read the file and display it on an overlay, allowing viewers to easily see what song is currently being played. Coded by Untamed; and by Wylk since the "Next" part.

about_limi_1.message: At the moment, now playing data is only saved when the song intially plays and is only updated when the next song starts playing. Thus if you stop playing music, the output file will still contain the last song played.

about_limi_2.message: Chrome limits what directories can be saved to, if you run into problems, try saving to a subdirectory of your profile (C:\Users\USERNAME* or C:\Documents and Settings\USERNAME*).

about_license_3.message: Additionally, the main icon was designed by CSS Creme, and icons designed by FatCow are used on the options pages.

contact_1.message: Si vous avez des propositions, retours, etc, vous pouvez poster ici http://obsproject.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=22&t=2614 ou ici https://github.com/Wylk/Untamed-Now-Playing-Next.

warn_opt.message:
Attention!
Vous devez configurer UNPN ! L'option principale est "Dossier de sauvegarde", choisissez où les informations de lecture en cours seront sauvegardée. Si vous avez des problèmes, faites moi en part (mes informations de contact sont ici).

error_new_ver.message: There is a new version ($VERSION$) of Untamed Now Playing available. If you're using the stable version, the extension will update automatically. However if you're using the development version, you need to update manually

err_directory_win.message: Erreur: Le dossier de sauvegarde ne peut pas avoir 'windows' dans le chemin

err_directory_unable.message:
Erreur: Impossible de lire dans le dossier de sauvegarde.

Chrome peut limiter la lecture/écriture dans les dossiers, si vous avez des problèmes, essayez de changer le dossier vers votre 'Mes Documents' ou un sous-dossier de ce dossier ex: 'C:\Users\Sam\Documents\unpn\'

err_directory_inaccess.message: Erreur: Impossible d'écrite dans le dossier de sauvegarde

err_fmt_invalid.message: Erreur: Le format de sauvegarde est invalide

err_fmt_toolong.message: Erreur: Le format du fichier simple dois être inférieur à 512 caractère

err_maxlen_invalid.message: Erreur: La longueur maximale des variables dois être un nombre entre 10 et 256

err_nightbot_user.message: Erreur: L'utilisateur Nightbot est manquant ou invalide

err_nightbot_key.message: Erreur: La clef Nightbot API est manquante ou invalide

err_stream_service.message: Erreur: Service du stream manquant ou invalide

err_stream_user.message: Erreur: Utilisateur du stream manquant ou invalide
